thread.title: Janet Orr
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Janet Orr

author: Janet Orr
title: Janet Orr
text: This is my first time making a purchase on Ruby Lane. It was quite straight forward without too much difficulty. It also gave me several options to chose from as far as the price was concerned and I liked that. Especially asking the dealer if they would accept the price I offered instead of just Ruby Lane.
